Code

Class HealingItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • Code.HealingItem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Buyable

    public class HealingItem
extends java.lang.Object
implements Buyable
    This class is for the healing items which can be bought at the shop and used at the hospital. Each healing item has a name, price, time (time needed to apply), and health (health increase).
